assumptions.name: The Train door controller is reliable.
The connection between Train door controller and Train actuator is reliable
The connection between Train actuator and Train door is reliable.

safety_constraint.unsafe_control_action: Train door controller provided open door command when train position is not aligned at platform and train motion is in movement
safety_constraint.safety_constraint: Train door controller must not provide open door command when train position is not aligned at platform and train motion is in movement

safety_constraint.unsafe_control_action: Train door controller provided open door command  too early when train position is not aligned at platform and train motion is in movement
safety_constraint.safety_constraint: Train door controller must not provide open door command  too early when train position is not aligned at platform and train motion is in movement

safety_constraint.unsafe_control_action: Train door controller provided close door command when door situation is person or object in doorway
safety_constraint.safety_constraint: Train door controller must not provide close door command when door situation is person or object in doorway

causal_analysis.scenario: Train door acutuator cannot act in Train Door ot complete the execution of the Control Action
causal_analysis.associated_causal_factor: Failure in the Train Door Actuator
causal_analysis.requirement: Tge Train Door Actuator must be mantained periodically
causal_analysis.rationale: Reliability analysis cas minimize the failures

causal_analysis.scenario: Train door Actuator performs a non issued- control action
causal_analysis.associated_causal_factor: Failure in the train door Actuator
causal_analysis.requirement: The train door actuator must be maintaned periodically
causal_analysis.rationale: Relialibility analysis can minimize the failures

causal_analysis.scenario: The system components do not poerform their functions
causal_analysis.associated_causal_factor: Failure in one or more components of the system
causal_analysis.requirement: Ongoing STPA analysis must be done in order to cover each change is the system
causal_analysis.rationale: Reliability analysis can be done for samll components introduced in the system. Complex components must have their own STPA analysis.

hazards.name: Door close on a person in the doorway.
Door open when the train is moving or not in a station.
Passengers/staff are unable to exit during an emergency.

losses.name: Injury to a person by falling out of the train.
Being hit by a closing door.
Being trapped inside a train during an emergency.

system_goals.name: Provide an easy way to control the door.
Ensure the safety of passengers in boarding and landing at stations.
Avoid any type of injury to passengers.
Make a safe trip between stations.

ssc.name: Door must not be opened when train is in motion.
When in Emergency situation, door must be opened.
Door must not be closed when exist a person or object in the doorway.
Door must not close on a person or object in the doorway.
Door must not open when the train is moving or not in a station.
When in Emergency situation, the door must be open.
